Get client id of a client_info container.
Get client type of a client_info container.

detaileddescription.para:
info
client_info container
client type The client type is either SND_SEQ_KERNEL_CLIENT or SND_SEQ_USER_CLIENT for kernel or user client respectively.

briefdescription.para: Get the name of a client_info container.
Get the broadcast filter usage of a client_info container.
Get the error-bounce usage of a client_info container.
Get the sound card number.

detaileddescription.para:
info
client_info container
card number or -1 if value is not available. Only available for SND_SEQ_KERNEL_CLIENT clients.

briefdescription.para: Get the owning PID.

detaileddescription.para:
info
client_info container
pid or -1 if value is not available. Only available for SND_SEQ_USER_CLIENT clients.

briefdescription.para: (DEPRECATED) Get the event filter bitmap of a client_info container

detaileddescription.para:
info
client_info container
NULL if no event filter, or pointer to event filter bitmap Use snd_seq_client_info_event_filter_check() instead.

briefdescription.para: Get the number of opened ports of a client_info container.
Get the number of lost events of a client_info container.
Set the client id of a client_info container.
Set the name of a client_info container.

(DEPRECATED) Set the event filter bitmap of a client_info container

detaileddescription.para:
info
client_info container
filter
event filter bitmap, pass NULL for no event filtering
Use snd_seq_client_info_event_filter_add instead.

briefdescription.para: Disable event filtering of a client_info container.

detaileddescription.para:
info
client_info container
Remove all event types added with snd_seq_client_info_event_filter_add and clear the event filtering flag of this client_info container.

briefdescription.para: Add an event type to the event filtering of a client_info container.

detaileddescription.para:
info
client_info container
event_type
event type to be added
Set the event filtering flag of this client_info and add the specified event type to the filter bitmap of this client_info container.

briefdescription.para: Remove an event type from the event filtering of a client_info container.

detaileddescription.para:
info
client_info container
event_type
event type to be removed
Removes the specified event from the filter bitmap of this client_info container. It will not clear the event filtering flag, use snd_seq_client_info_event_filter_clear instead.

briefdescription.para: Check if an event type is present in the event filtering of a client_info container.

detaileddescription.para:
info
client_info container
event_type
event type to be checked
1 if the event type is present, 0 otherwise Test if the event type is in the filter bitmap of this client_info container.

briefdescription.para: obtain the current client information

detaileddescription.para:
seq
sequencer handle
info
the pointer to be stored
0 on success otherwise a negative error code Obtains the information of the current client stored on info. client and type fields are ignored.

briefdescription.para: obtain the information of the given client

detaileddescription.para:
seq
sequencer handle
client
client id
info
the pointer to be stored
0 on success otherwise a negative error code Obtains the information of the client with a client id specified by info argument. The obtained information is written on info parameter.

briefdescription.para: set the current client information

detaileddescription.para:
seq
sequencer handle
info
the client info data to set
0 on success otherwise a negative error code Obtains the information of the current client stored on info. client and type fields are ignored.

briefdescription.para: query the next client

detaileddescription.para:
seq
sequencer handle
info
query pattern and result
Queries the next client. The search begins at the client with an id one greater than client field in info. If a client is found, its attributes are stored in info, and zero is returned. Otherwise returns a negative error code.

seq
sequencer handle
info
information to update
